title: obfuscated scripts
extract: When discussing malicious scripts, obfuscation is a technique attackers use to purposefully obscure their source code. They do this primarily for two purposes: subverting antivirus and intrusion detection / prevention systems and deterring future reverse engineering efforts.Oct 3, 2016
extract_html: When discussing malicious scripts, obfuscation is a technique attackers use to purposefully obscure their source code. They do this primarily for two purposes: subverting antivirus and intrusion detection / prevention systems and deterring future reverse engineering efforts.Oct 3, 2016
